name: Healthyfied Egg Garlic Spread
description: Dive into a world of flavor with our Healthyfied Egg Garlic Spread! This keto, low-carb, diabetic-friendly, and low-sugar recipe is perfect for those looking to enjoy a healthy yet delicious option. Ideal for anyone following a strict dietary regimen but not willing to compromise on taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Start by boiling the eggs until they are hard-boiled, approximately 10 minutes, then cool, peel, and finely chop them.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the red bell pepper into fine pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the chopped eggs, Greek yogurt, diced red bell pepper, garlic powder, and salt. Stir until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat and then saut√© the egg mixture for about 5 minutes, until heated through and flavors meld.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
